Good verbal and written communication skills.
Good knowledge on BS IS Codes and Standards. Roles & Responsibilities:You will be part of the Water and Environment team carrying out the design of a range of elements associated with infrastructure drainage, treatment plants, Hydrology and Hydraulics projects.  You will be responsible for:Design of treatment plants, River, Dam and Maritime, Pipelines, Water retaining structures
Modelling related to water and water infrastructure (storm, wastewater, water)
Flood risk assessment, Flood alleviation, water Quality modelling  
maintaining technical quality standards
delivering projects to time and budget
liaising with UK based customers in a responsive and client focused mannerWhat we offer at Atkins?At Atkins, you will enjoy a robust rewards package which includes:Opportunity to work on various projects of various sizes.
